title: Contact form
desc: You have a question regarding our application or a problem? We are happy to help.  Please complete the whole form so we know exactly what the situation is.
privacy: By submitting this form, you allow us to temporarily store the personal data sent for the purpose of contacting you. Further information on this can be found in our data protection declaration.
feedbackTxt: Thank you, We have received your request and will get back to you soon.
fillAllFields: Please fill in all fields correctly.
